structure.unit: Jurisdiction And Emblems Of The Commonwealth, The General Court, Statutes And Public Documents

law.catch_line: Calling House To Order; Presiding Officer
law.text: On said first Wednesday of January, between the hours of ten in the forenoon and twelve at noon, the persons so returned and admitted as members into the representativesâ€™ chamber shall be called to order by the oldest senior member present, who shall be the presiding officer of the house until a speaker is chosen or the house otherwise determines.
